basics.name: Cameron Arakaki
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

projects.summary: A way to recruit students to local companies affiliated with UH Manoa.
highlights: Helped with front end design of pages using Javascript and React.
Assisted in designing components to populate the database.

projects.summary: A site for managing rooms in POST building at UH Manoa.
highlights: Helped create components for populating data.
Developed the sign-in/sign-out functions of the site.

work.summary: Front of the house. First to meet and interact with guests.
highlights: Deliver items to guests quickly and efficiently.
Work with other departments to meet guest requests. For example, changing rooms, receiving packages.
Greet guests upon arrival. Offer food suggestions, local attractions, activities.
Cleaned and sanitized the work environment in an efficient manner to increase the flow of customers.

work.summary: Wrang up groceries and stocked items.
highlights: Have good knowledge of UPCs and and understanding of sales laws.
Worked in a team setting with front office, other cashiers, courtesy clerks, grocery workers.
